price: Baravuga bati “(Oya)! Ahubwo twasanze abakurambere bacu babikora batyo.”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
